title: Education for Strengthening Disaster Response Capabilities to Heavy Rainfall

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Requires real-time video lectures and mobile-friendly materials in a smartphone-based learning environment. Emphasis on improving practical response capabilities through real-case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more risk factors and safety rules during heavy rainfall.
Learners can perform rapid evacuation route selection and emergency response procedures during disasters.
Learners can discuss and present team-based community-level disaster response strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
